configuration.stem: Each kidney contains more than 1 million filtering structures called nephrons. The nephron is made up of several tissue types. Based on the information, which statement is true?

feedBack.finalWrongHint: [That’s not it. /Well done.] Nephrons are made of several different tissue types, so they are classified as an organ.

options.name: mc-opt-item-028151441155932844
options.text: The nephron can be defined as an organ.

options.name: mc-opt-item-06761015402153134x1
options.text: The nephron cannot be defined as an organ.
options.hint: That’s not it. Think about which level of organization is made up of several different tissue types, and try again.

options.name: _widget_-05917539613097362
options.hint: That’s not it. Think about which level of organization is made up of several different tissue types, and try again.
options.text: The nephron can be defined as an organ system.

options.name: _widget_-009524016716199046
options.hint: That’s not it. Think about which level of organization is made up of several different tissue types, and try again.
options.text: The nephron can be defined as a tissue.
